tool.name: basinParams

param.name: stabbr
param.dialogReference:
The abbreviated name of the region on which to perform delineation.

This must be an abbreviation of one of the 50 United States (ex. NY, TX), the District of Columbia (DC), the Connecticut River Basin (CRB), the Delaware River Basin (DRB) or the Rainy River Basin (RRB).

param.name: workspaceID
param.dialogReference: The workspace folder used for basin delineation.

param.name: parameters_list
param.dialogReference:
The semi-colon (;) separated list of characteristics to be computed.

Ex, "drnarea;precip"

param.name: input_basin
param.dialogReference: Input Watershed polygon feature class. Characteristics will be added to the input basin's Attribute Table.

tool.summary:
The "Calculate Basin Characteristics" tool calculates the specified characteristics for the basin and adds them to the input basin's Attribute Table.

This tool must be used on an existing basin. If the basin does not yet exist, run the "Basin Delineation" tool first.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The "Calculate Basin Characteristics" tool calculates the specified characteristics for the basin and adds them to the input basin's Attribute Table.

This tool must be used on an existing basin. If the basin does not yet exist, run the "Basin Delineation" tool first.
